title: Rooms and Furniture 1
sentences: The living room is very cozy.
The bed is big and soft.
There is a large mirror in the hallway.
Ich hänge meine Kleidung in den
I hang my clothes in the closet.
The lamp is on the table.
We are all sitting on the sofa.
The books are in the shelf.
The rug lies on the floor.
A beautiful picture hangs on the wall.
The bathroom is unfortunately very small.
We eat in the dining room.
My desk is in the office/study.
I open the curtain in the morning.
The floor is made of stone.
The jackets hang in the hallway.
The pillow lies on the bed.
There is a plant in the corner.
dictionary:
das Wohnzimmer - living room
das Schlafzimmer - bedroom
das Bett - bed
der Spiegel - mirror
der Schrank - closet/cupboard
die Lampe - lamp
das Sofa - sofa
das Regal - shelf
der Teppich - rug/carpet
die Wand - wall
das Bild - picture
das Badezimmer - bathroom
das Esszimmer - dining room
der Schreibtisch - desk
der Vorhang - curtain
der Boden - floor
die Decke - ceiling
der Flur - hallway
das Zimmer - room
die Küche - kitchen
der Sessel - armchair
das Kissen - pillow
die Pflanze - plant
das Arbeitszimmer - study/office
das Licht - light
